article_title: Frederick County mental health care in 'near crisis conditions,' report says

og.description: The lack of mental health care providers is creating waiting lists and “near crisis conditions” in Frederick County, according to local experts and a county report.
og.title: Frederick County mental health care in 'near crisis conditions,' report says
